alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 6:31PM EDT until July 28 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ASHTABULA COUNTY... At 630 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Andover, or 18 miles southeast of Ashtabula, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Andover and Cherry Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
